titles.title: To create an additional judgeship for the eastern district of California, and for other purposes.
To create an additional judgeship for the eastern district of California, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

term.name: Advice and consent of the Senate

bill.summary: Directs the President to appoint, with the advice and consent of the Senate, one additional district judge for the eastern district of California.
